MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Y Borth, affecting properties in High Street, Bryngwyn Close and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required into the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55AM on 20th January 2021
